item.description:
Note from Jane about Sunday!!!

Hi friends,
I am so looking forward to seeing all of you on Sunday!

Rabbi Miller has asked that we all park on Pleasant Street or any of the side streets, and not on the temple parking lot.
At the last Bagel Breakfast, parents couldn't get into the parking lot to pick up their children from Snnday School, and one of our own Singles Mingles guests had her car side-swiped because of all of the cars parked all over the parking lot!

Rabbi Miller has also asked that we enter the temple from the doors on the extreme right side- closest to Pleasant Street- and not through the Religious School entrance on the left.
THANK YOU !
Jane

Please RSVP to Jane at singlesmingle18@aol.com if you are interested in attending the breakfast. You can RSVP on this site for the purpose of communicating to others in our group that you are going or to carpool but you must let Jane know you are interested in attending!

Singles Bagel Breakfast


Inviting all Jewish singles 40+,50+ and 60+ ??.



Nu? So, what's new with you?

Come to our Singles Shmooze and Shmear Breakfast

Bagels, cream cheese, coffee and conversation

Email now to make your reservation



Sunday, February 3, 2008 10:00 am-12:00 noon

Temple Beth Am - 300 Pleasant Street ? Framingham



Email~ singlesmingle18@aol.com now to make a reservation

Leave your name, your phone number, and number attending

Please make a reservation by December 10th so we can plan for

the food.



Cost - $6.00 with a reservation

$8.00 without a reservation/at the door

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ __ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

DIRECTIONS to Temple Beth Am- Framingham


FROM ROUTE 495: From The Cape, Rhode Island or New Hampshire

Take ROUTE 495 to MASS PIKE/I-90 EAST
Continue with directions under "FROM MASS PIKE" below




FROM MASS PIKE: Coming from The West or East

Take MASS PIKE/I-90 to Exit 12 to Framingham
Follow ROUTE 9 EAST for 1.5 miles from exit ramp
After passing reservoir get into left lane for 1/2 mile. Continue to the second set of lights
(at Temple Street, A CVS will be on your right side)
TURN LEFT. Go to the end of Temple Street
RIGHT onto Pleasant Street
The temple is 1/4 mile on your RIGHT side
(Pass the back entrance and turn into the parking lot.)



FROM ROUTE 9: Coming from the West

Follow ROUTE 9 EAST
After passing under the Mass Pike and Bernardi Toyota, get into left lane for approx.
1/2 mile. Continue to the second set of lights (at Temple Street, A CVS will be on your right side)
TURN LEFT onto Temple Street. Go to the end of Temple Street
RIGHT TURN onto Pleasant Street
The temple is 1/4 mile on your RIGHT side (300 Pleasant Street)
(Pass the back entrance and turn into the parking lot.)



FROM ROUTE 9: Coming from the East

Follow ROUTE 9 WEST
After the fire station, there is a Mobil Station. After the Mobil Station, Take a quick RIGHT TURN onto Maynard Road
Go to 300 yards to the first intersection (Pleasant Street)
TURN LEFT onto Pleasant Street
The temple is 1/4 mile on your LEFT side (300 Pleasant Street)
(turn into the parking lot.)
item.name: Singles Mingle Bagel Breakfast
